120097.「あなたが作ってくれた ヘヴィーアーマーは\n 究極の防具を創るための 大切な器:
The Heavy Armor you made for us is a precious
vessel for creating the ultimate armor...

120098.「あとは 命の炎を使うだけ……。: Now all we need to do is use Life Fire...

120101.「……ひさしぶりだね リリム姉さん。\n ボクだ。弟のツィムだよ。:
It's been a while, Lilim. This is me. This is
my brother Zim.

120102.「……究極の防具というのは\n あの日 父さんを殺して作ったのと\n 同じものな:
The ultimate armor is the same one you made
that day when you killed my father, right?

120103.「そんなことは ボクがさせない！\n たかが防具のために\n 誰かの命を奪うなん:
I won't let that happen! I will never take
someone's life for a piece of armor ever
again..!

120105.「かわいそうに ツィム。\n また 発作を起こしたのね。: Poor Zim, you had another seizure.

120106.「驚いたかしら？ <pc>。\n ……このヨロイは 私の弟 ツィム。\n 弟の魂:
Am I surprised? <pc>. ...This armor
is my brother Zim, whose soul resides in his
armor...

120107.「防具鍛冶の奥義とは 器となる防具を創り\n 人ひとりの命の炎を犠牲に 鍛え直し:
The art of armor smithing is the art of creating armor, sacrificing one's life fire, and forging it back into a vessel to jump over
those who are doomed to death.

120108.「我が血筋だけに継承されし\n 禁断の秘術で……ツィムは 今日まで\n 人の姿で:
The forbidden secret, inherited only by my
bloodline, has allowed Zim to survive in human
form to this day.

120109.「……でもね ツィム。\n あなたの 今の器は もう限界なのよ。:
But you see, Zim, your current vessel has
reached its limits.

120111.「じっとしていなさい ツィム。\n ……すぐ また 元気に\n 動き回れるように:
Stay still, Zim...soon you will be up and
about again...

120112.「姉さん？ 何を言ってるんだ！？: Sister? What are you talking about!

120113.「……そうね。これが最期になるのだから\n あなたにも すべてを教えておくわ。\:
Well... And since this is the last time I'm going to tell you this, I'm going to tell you everything. The truth about what happened that
day.

120114.「あの日……。\n まだ 私たち家族が\n ガタラで 仲良く暮らしていた頃。:
That day... When our family was still living
together in Gatara.

120115.「防具鍛冶職人だった父さんと 幼いあなたは\n 鍛冶の素材を求めて 出かけ\n:
My father, who was an armorsmith, and you, as
a young child, went out in search of materials
for blacksmithing, while I stayed at home...

120116.「お父さんも ツィムも 遅いな～。\n おなかすいてきちゃった……。: Your father and Zim are late. I'm starving...

120117.「お父さん！\n どうしたのっ そんなにキズだらけで！？:
Dad! What's the matter? You're covered in
scratches!

120118.「素材を集めている途中で\n ツィムが ガケから 落ちたのだ……。\n 私も…そ:
Zim fell off the gasket while I was collecting
materials... I was trying to help him...

120119.「ふたりとも ひどいケガ……。\n 待ってて！ 今 お医者さんを呼んでくる！:
They're both badly hurt... Hold on! I'll get a
doctor!

120120.「待て！ リリム……。\n 医者は呼ぶな……。: Wait! Lilim... Don't call the doctor...

120121.「お前が 医者を連れてくるまで\n ツィムは もたない……。\n それより 私に:
Zim won't last until you bring a doctor. I
have a better idea.

120123.「でも……お父さん いたそうだよ？\n ツィムだって キズだらけで……。:
But...I heard you had a father, Zim, who was
covered in scratches...

120124.「私の言うことをきくんだ。\n 代々 我が血筋に継承されてきた奥義を\n リリム:
Listen to me. Lilim, I give you the secrets
that have been passed down in my bloodline
from generation to generation...

120125.「このヨロイを……我が命の炎を使い\n ツィムの命を つなぎとめるための\n 器:
This armor will be used as a vessel to bring
about Zim's life using my Life Fire!

120126.「どうせ 私も このケガでは長くない。\n ……せめて ツィムだけでも\n 助け:
I don't have long to live with this injury
anyway. I want to save Zim at least...

120133.「お父さんの命の炎……。\n クスッ。とっても キ・レ・イ……<heart>:
Your father's Life Fire... Cussh. Very ki-
re-i...<heart>.

120135.「この身体は ヨロイで創られたものだと？\n そんなこと……信じられない……。:
You think this body was created by armor? I
don't believe that...I don't believe that...

120136.「信じようと 信じまいと\n それが 真実なのよ……。: Believe it or not, it's the truth...

120137.「……あの時の私は まだ防具鍛冶職人として\n 未熟だった。そのせいで ツィム…:
I was not yet an armorsmith then. Because of
that, Zim your body will soon decay.

120138.「だから……その前に 私の命の炎を使って\n あなたの身体を 創り直すの！！:
So...before I do that, I will use my Life Fire
to re-create your body!

120139.「どうして……？\n 命の炎を ヨロイが 受け付けないなんて……？: How can armor not accept Life Fire?

120140.「<pc>の創った ヘヴィーアーマーは\n ツィムの新しい命の器として\n 申し:
The heavy armor created by <pc>
should be the perfect vessel for Zim's new
life. And yet...

120142.「<pc>の 魂の炎が\n すでに ヨロイを 満たしてる……？:
The flames of <pc>'s soul have
already filled his armor...?

120143.「このヨロイには 命の炎を宿す 余地がない。\n 防具鍛冶職人としての 魂の炎が:
There is no room for Life Fire in this armor,
because it is a perfect armor that contains
every bit of the fire of Armorsmith's soul...

120144.「……時間がないわ。\n 急いで もう一度 新しい命の器……\n 別のヨロイを:
We are running out of time. We must hurry up
and build once again a new vessel of life,
another armor for Zim.

120147.「……ボクには\n この身体が 生身のものなのか\n ヨロイで できているのかは:
I don't know if this body is made of flesh or
armor.

120148.「だけど……姉さんや 父さんが\n ボクのことを 大切に想っていてくれた。\n:
But... my sister and father cared about me.
That's all I know.

120149.「もし この身体が 父さんの命の炎が\n 創ってくれたものだというなら\n ボク:
If this body was created by my father's Life
Fire, then I'll stay like this forever.

120150.「子供の頃から 発作を起こすたびに\n いつも 死を覚悟していたよ……。\n 今:
Ever since I was a child, every time I had a seizure, I always thought I was going to die... It's enough that I've lived to this
day.

120151.「……それに こうして ひさしぶりに\n 姉さんと話ができて 長年の誤解が解けた:
And, being able to talk to you like this for the first time in a long time has cleared up a long-standing misunderstanding. I have no
regrets about dying here and now.

120152.「リリム姉さん。\n そんなにも つらい思いをした姉さんを\n ずっと疑っていて:
Sister Lilim. I'm sorry I doubted you for so
long.

120153.「……ふたりきりの家族じゃないか。\n やっと会えたのに\n この上 姉さんまで:
It's just the two of us. I don't want to lose
my sister as well after finally meeting her.

120155.「わかったわ ツィム。\n 奥義は 封印するわ……。: Okay Zim, I'll seal the depths...

120156.「あなたには 迷惑をかけたわね。\n ……ありがとう <pc>。:
I'm sorry for all the trouble I put you
through. ...Thanks <pc>.

120157.「そうだ。あとで 話があるから\n ギルドのカウンターへ来てちょうだい。\n 待:
Yes, that's right. I need to talk to you
later. Come to the counter at Guild. I'll be
waiting.
